content.headline: About Lafayette Testing Services, Inc. (LTS)
content.paragraph: Lafayette Testing Services, Inc. (LTS) was established to meet the increasing need that the industrial community has for high quality Nondestructive Testing and CNC Precision Machining services at competitive prices.
LTS Leadership: Terry DiLorenzo: President, Willie Truitt: Vice President Sales/Marketing, Jeff Jerome: Laboratory Manager, and Kirven Zerbe: Vice President/Director of Operations

Since our beginning in 1992, LTS has experienced substantial growth. The success of our company is a result of our operating philosophy. We put the customer first by considering Time, Cost, Quality and Customer Service.

We understand that Time is very valuable in today's competitive market. We are constantly looking for ways to improve inspections and refine current procedures without compromising quality. Unexpected failures can result in Costly repairs, downtime, and injury due to consequential damages. Our technical services can reduce the risk of such occurrences. We also understand that Quality is necessary because of the performance expectations of our customers. Therefore, we deliver the highest quality service and assure reliability. We feel that our name must represent quality to our customers and to ourselves.

Lafayette Testing Service's continued success depends upon complete customer satisfaction. Customer Service is a top priority and we strive to insure quality service in a timely manner at a competitive rate. At LTS we set our goals to achieve total customer satisfaction and to deliver outstanding service. SERVICE SECOND TO NONE.

Dedicated Professionals… The LTS advantage

When LTS handles your Nondestructive Testing and CNC Precision Machining, you can rest assured that you are in the hands of dedicated professionals. From start to finish, you will find a valuable partner working with the most updated technology to make sure you get accurate results within the shortest possible time frame.
